org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.extension

Class AbstractExtensionConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.extension.AbstractExtensionConfigurationLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.camel.CamelContextAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesExtensionConfigurationLoader

    public abstract class AbstractExtensionConfigurationLoader
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.apache.camel.CamelContextAware
    Parent class for loading OpenHub extensions. There is collection of Spring XML configurations and each XML configuration represents root configuration for each extension. New child Spring context will be created for each extension - see loadExtensions(String...).

    If isAutoRouteAdding() is true then route definitions which extends AbstractExtRoute) will be automatically added to CamelContext.

    Author:
    Petr Juza
    See Also:
    ClassPathXmlApplicationContext

      • loadExtensions

        protected final void loadExtensions(String... extConfigLocations)
        Loads Spring configuration files. Each config represents root configuration file for one extension and new child Spring context will be created for each extension.
        Parameters:
        extConfigLocations - Extension configuration locations

      • isAutoRouteAdding

        public boolean isAutoRouteAdding()
        Returns whether automatically detect Camel routes (those which extends AbstractExtRoute) and add them to Camel context.
        Returns:
        true for automatic adding routes, otherwise false

      • setAutoRouteAdding

        public void setAutoRouteAdding(boolean autoRouteAdding)
        Sets whether automatically detect Camel routes (those which extends AbstractExtRoute) and add them to Camel context.

        There is possibility to create own Camel context for specific extension and then it's not suitable to add routes automatically.

        Default value is true.

        Parameters:
        autoRouteAdding - true for automatic adding routes, otherwise false
